Brooklyn Heights is one of the most sophisticated and diverse neighborhoods in New York. Located five minutes from Manhattan, Brooklyn Heights is a quiet, urban community, rich in history, culture, shopping and dining. Legends such as Walt Whitman, Truman Capote, Marilyn Monroe, and Bob Dylan have lived in New York's first historic landmark district, where they too enjoyed the beauty of The Promenade, the symmetry of row houses and Italianate Brownstones, and the proximity of New York City.Brooklyn Heights has kept much of its charm and old-world feel intact as it has evolved into a chic New York suburb. Blocks away, flourishes a vibrant local scene offering an array of contemporary restaurants, bars, parks, boutiques, and multiple subway lines.
